info.name: 4. Healthcare Service/Location/Organization
info.description:
HealthcareService is only expected (mandatory) when the SDS LDAP Organization.type = RO197


https://nhsd-jira.digital.nhs.uk/browse/AEA-448

Also see https://github.com/NHSDigital/electronic-prescription-service-api/pull/103/files

exec: pm.test("Body matches and contains the correct Cost Centre number  ", function () {
pm.test("ODS Code is Cost Centre value A99968 (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('ParentPrescription > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > responsibleParty > AgentPerson > representedOrganization > id').attr('extension');

request.description:
See ticket AEA-479

 Organization needs to be from the users card and needs an Organization Name (AEA-479) and Organization Type

 Organization nmme and cost centre name needs same Cost centre details as Cost Centre in Medication Request section (see powerpoint presentaton)
